column4: hey guys, whats the startup file to modify what is booted up on startup ?
There are quite a few.  There's no do-all "msconfig". if that's what you're looking for.
well, my friend wants to startup vncserver...we're wondering where to put it
Hmm... If you run it once, does it not set itself to run auto-magically on boot? Most of my services-related experience was on RedHat, so I'm at a loss for the actual configs.  =/
